member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_CRL_INFO
member.summary: Contains information updated by a certificate revocation list (CRL) revocation type handler. The CERT_REVOCATION_CRL_INFO structure is used with both base and delta CRLs.

member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_CRL_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the structure.

member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_CRL_INFO.pCrlEntry
member.summary: A pointer to an entry in either the base CRL or the delta CRL.

member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_CRL_INFO.fDeltaCrlEntry
member.summary: TRUE if pCrlEntry points to an entry in the delta CRL. FALSE if pCrlEntry points to an entry in the base CRL.

member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_CRL_INFO.pBaseCRLContext
member.summary: A pointer to a base CRL context.

member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_CRL_INFO.pDeltaCRLContext
member.summary: A pointer to a delta CRL context.
